tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    publication_date DATE,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    document_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Documentation (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    year INTEGER,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RepairManuals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255),
  published_year INT,
  document TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationGuides (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255),
  published_year INT,
  document TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CarMagazines (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  editor VARCHAR(255),
  published_year INT,
  issue_number INT
);

CREATE TABLE Searchable_Database (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  search_term STRING,
  documentation_type STRING,
  document_title STRING,
  document_text TEXT
);
